comments:
M8 + 27/04/2004 HEAD

When you resize a detached view the content within it does not resize as well. 
This includes the toolbars as well as the content area.  Image forthcoming.
Created an attachment (id=10005)
Bad view
There is a more serious error on shutdown. We get an SWT error when an update 
occurs on a detached view. This also has a knock on effect of an SWT error 
when processing a commands update

I'm seeing this in I20040504 on Linux-Gtk+.  If I grab a view toolbar and drop
it back into the same detached view, the contents resize themselves correctly again.
Works in I20050401-1205.
